name: ETH Meta
description:
ETHMeta is a public chain developed based on the BFMeta underlying blockchain architecture, aimed at enhancing the performance of Ethereum in various aspects.
⭐ No time or geographical restrictions, secure & easy cryptocurrency transfers
Enjoy cryptocurrency transactions globally now! Whether sending or receiving, just a simple click is needed to easily complete transactions of over 1000+ supported blockchain assets. Your global digital asset management tool is now live!
⭐ Upgrade Ethereum, seamlessly bridge to ETHMeta
One-click upgrade to Ethereum's metaverse, experiencing smoother metaverse chain transactions
⭐ Various exchange modes, flexible switching
Featuring outstanding trading functions, providing precise candlestick charts, supporting 9+ mainstream public chains, easily achieving one-click cross-chain transactions, ensuring a smooth and efficient trading experience.
⭐ Comprehensive security protection technology
Supports backup and recovery with 12/15/18/21/24/36 character Chinese/English/Traditional Chinese mnemonic phrases;
Set an 8-digit wallet password and use fingerprint authentication for secondary protection;
BFMeta/PayMetaChain/BFChainV2/ETHMeta/BFChain/CCChain networks support on-chain transaction password settings for double encryption of assets;
Private keys are encrypted and securely stored locally on your phone, with multiple backup options available to ensure they are not lost.
⭐ Supports popular cryptocurrency wallets:
Ethereum ETH
Binance BSN
TRON TRX
BFMeta BFM
ETHMeta ETHM
PayMetachain PMC
CCChain CCC
BFChainV2 BFT
BFChain BFT
Download ETH Meta for a metaverse cryptocurrency wallet experience.
release_date: Fri Aug 16 2024 17:48:06 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
author: eth-metaverse.com
